cuisineType: Cuisine from the Marches, Italian Contemporary
description: A new restaurant in Urbino’s beautiful old town, where the designer-style decor blends harmoniously with the historic architecture. The modern, contemporary-style cuisine finds inspiration in ingredients from the Marche, as well as featuring flavours and traditions from other regions of Italy such as Sardinia, Campania and Lazio.
